overview: The sequel to "1:00 A.M," bringing you another three ghostly stories. First, see what happens when a costumer uses the mask of a dead actress to design a new wig. Second, witness three actresses' curiosity-gone-bad when they discover that their agent is messing around with the spirit of a deceased woman. And third, watch a commercial film-shoot cut short when the filmmakers are haunted by the apparition of a young boy.
title: 02:00 A.M.
